subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With two goals from Derick Brassard, and one each from J. T. Miller, Lee Stempniak and Jesper Fast, the Rangers claimed their 10th straight regular-season victory against the Flyers at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: With two goals from Derick Brassard, and one each from J. T. Miller, Lee Stempniak and Jesper Fast, the Rangers claimed their 10th straight regular-season victory against the Flyers at Madison Square Garden.
